document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2000-04
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON LIMITING NEW WATER AND SEWER CONNECTIONS AND SERVICES TO RESIDENCES AND BUSINESSES WITHIN THE CITY'SCORPORATE LIMITS, AND UNDER CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES THE CITY'S URBAN LIMIT LINE AND THE CITY WATER SERVICE AREA
